website_summaries.verdict: Offers 2 games for the price of one quality set. All equipment and accessories included. Great for family picnics.
pros: Wide net for a variety of game set-ups
Upgrade from cheaper entry level volleyball sets
cons: Badminton rackets and shuttlecocks not professional grade

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great quality for some backyard fun. I made two cement buckets with 1 1/2 PVC pipes in them to support the set, which made it sturdy and quick to put up and take down. I have no plans to leave it up days at a time, so hopefully will last for years to come since it will be minimally exposed to the elements. I will say one raquet had the grip tape start to unravel, but that was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: Connecting metal parts too weak to support the net
customer_reviews.text: We used this once. The stakes bent, and an "S" curved hook used to connect the nylon rope to the side supports is now more like a "J". It's not strong enough to support the tension needed to keep the net up, rendering it totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality set for both volleyball and badminton
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about buying a set for so much money, but it was a combination volleyball and badminton set with all the parts and rackets/balls/shuttlecocks. The set is fully complete even with a pump to pump up the volleyball and a durable cord to mark the outline of the court with spikes to keep it in place. The net is VERY durable not like those cheap nets I've bought before. And it can all be contained in the bag that is included. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the set is very nice. Notice the stitching on the picture
customer_reviews.text: Netting is not stitched properly and there are gaps in the area that should be held together. This may be an inconsistency, but the net does not stay in the black framed area due to the stitching on the one I received. May I have a replacement net? This one was not quality checked or was passed through. The rest of the set is very nice. Notice the stitching on the picture. Areas are missed and this is in various places.

customer_reviews.title: MISSING SHUTTLECOCKS! Otherwise it’s good quality
customer_reviews.text: The overall set is pretty nice. OUR SET DID NOT HAVE SHUTTLECOCKS! The tube was completely empty. It was weird because the set appeared as though it was sealed, but someone could have been careful with their tape job. Other than that, it seems like a quality set. It only has one net for both sports. It’s not quite as easy to go between sports as the description states but it’s still good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Sokko

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the grand kids put this together one weekend and play with it. To my surprise they not only loved it, but they were also impressed in the quality of all the components. It's been awhile since I played badminton or volleyball, but they play often and know a good set when they see one, and this seems to be it!!! Kid certified A+
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for our daughter’s graduation party and to have a set to replace our old one. This set was easy for two of us to set up and it looks great! The net is really nice and looks professional. We’ve had hours and hours of fun playing badminton and volleyball. The only downside is the shuttlecocks are really light so they don’t go very far when hit. I got some extras on Amazon (different brand) and those were much better and more what we’re used to using. Overall, we love this and look forward to using it for many more seasons.
customer_reviews.author: mrsshippy

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying this set for a year now. It's super easy to set up and take down. It's sturdy and after a year of use by a lot of kids it still looks brand new. Great set, highly recommend. The carry bag fits everything quite nicely. Perfect for storage and transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set for a month now, and have used it twice to play badminton. If you don't know what you're doing, like us, tying the net to the pole is the hardest part of assembly; we figured it out. None of the rackets have broken or started peeling yet like some reviews suggested, and the birdies are all fine as well. We're thinking about getting some glow-in-the-dark birdies so we can play at night! Also, the boundary lines are sweet. Strangers passing by have complimented our set. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use during a family reunion. Before purchasing I had so many people tell me not to waste my money on the cheap Walmart ones because they are good for 1x use and that is it. I read the reviews on this set and thought it was worth a try. Boy am I glad I did. It is a breeze to put up. We left the net up in the back yard for 5 days straight and it still looks great. we got hours of fun out of it and look forward to many more.
customer_reviews.author: JStratton

customer_reviews.title: Best net for the money
customer_reviews.text: With much searching and researching for a good net that will hold up and not fall down I chose this one. I wasn't sure what to expect at first but after getting it all set up my daughters loves it. As with the cheaper ones they were always falling down this one don't it stays up even in the strongest winds. If you want a good net this one is it the metal poles hold up where the cheap plastic ones just break. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set as a replacement and are very pleased with the sturdiness of it. The poles are metal and the net is much thicker than some of the cheaper sets. Assembly was simple and took only a few minutes. This set even includes boundary lines! This set is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING You Need.  Can't Beat it for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: One of those purchases where the quality surpasses expectations. Everything from the net to the ball and the racquets... very nice quality. A big surprise was the boundary line. I was unaware it was included in the set, and was trying to figure out a way to line the grass. Super impressed with the quality and completeness of the set!
customer_reviews.author: BoMan

customer_reviews.title: I'm stuck with a useless gear that I was tricked into buying
customer_reviews.text: Seller states item include a regulation size Badminton and Volley ball net. That is incorrect. A regulation size Badminton court is 20 feet in width and 44 feet in length. The net in the kit is 30' long. That's 10' longer than regulation and will not fit the court at my gym. Unfortunate, I trusted the seller and didn't rush to use the equipment. As a result I missed the 30 day return window. Now, I'm stuck with a useless gear that I was tricked into buying. HG .
customer_reviews.author: Harry G

customer_reviews.title: Solid Badminton Set
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you need. Setup wasn't too bad, but the poles need a bit more stability. So we made cement bases out of plastic buckets and 1.5" PVC. Otherwise, the equipment is pretty good. I've had to re-wrap the handles on a couple of the rackets, but they've been used ALOT, so I think that would be the case with any racket. Buy extra shuttlecocks, you'll need 'em.
customer_reviews.author: krikiter

customer_reviews.title: Not as described in picture
customer_reviews.text: Set seems nice, however the picture and description states that the item comes with Badminton net and Volleyball net. My set only had Volleyball net. Also, the price dropped $20 within a couple weeks of ordering. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: This was our second attempt at purchasing a combo set. The first time we bought one at target in the spur of the moment, everything went wrong and so the second time round we did our homework. Glad we did, this is awesome everything easy packs back into the bag we even had room for some extra rackets. It sets up easy and is a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gurney

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: And that's the most important thing :) After giving them some time to use it I checked with my son and daughter in law. They said it was easy to assemble, the components are sturdy and they are enjoying it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding net! Very durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was definitely worth the price. It was super easy to put together and the instructions were easy to follow. Though it did take two people to set up. My favorite feature is the marking lines, they’re easy to use and I didn’t have to waste money on marking spray paint. 5/5 I definitely recommend for a family reunion, grad party, or competitive play!
customer_reviews.author: Vence

customer_reviews.title: Great directions!
customer_reviews.text: Goal is well made. The most impressive thing is the directions. I have never seen better organized directions for anything!. Each page has a picture of the parts for that page, plus the parts were packed in separate cellophane envelopes that matched each page. Even if you have a hard time time putting things together, this will be easy. Will require 2 people due to size and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kspoon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backyard badminton/volleyball kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Average quality light weight rackets with decent string tension. May need to buy better rackets for advanced players. Net posts are very sturdy & weather proof- I keep it out in my backyard , rain or shine- no issues till now in past few months. Nylon birdies included are durable but a bit slow- may want to buy separate feather birdies for advanced players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awesome set. I Didn’t realize how long it is but thankfully i have the space in my yard for it. The net set up is easy and it is sturdy once it’s up. Lots of fun. Will use this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Casserly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It comes with a bag so it’s easy to put away and store. My friend and I were able to set it up no problem within 15 minutes. The rockets are very light and seem to be holding up well. Even came with a pump to fill the volleyball. My family had a lot of fun this summer playing. Would def recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.author: Caroline H.

customer_reviews.title: we would love the set
customer_reviews.text: I paid for 1 day shipping to have this net for my daughter’s high school graduation party. The box arrives on time but the volleyball had a hole in it so it didn’t work and I had to run out at the last minute to buy a new ball. The net is very well made and will last a long time. If it wasn’t for there ball, we would love the set.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Exceded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: i did not realize when I purchased this item that it was both Volleyball and Badminton. Great design makes setting up the court very easy. Same boundary line can be sized for both Volleyball and Badminton. Sturdy good quality was easy to set up. I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for about a week. Taken it down and set it up a couple times for both badminton and volleyball. My 8 year old daughter and I set it up in less than ten minutes right out of the box. Very simple to set up and has been very sturdy for both games. I love the boundary fabric as it has grommets in different positions to adjust the size of the court equally all the way around. My wife and I, and our 3 kids absolutely love this set. We have been using it everyday since we got it and have had no issues with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price! The net is decent quality. So far, the raquets are fine for novice players. You’ll want to order additional shuttlecocks to go along with the set. The ones included aren’t going to last long. We haven’t inflated the volleyball yet, a pump is included in the set, hopefully they work well.
customer_reviews.author: R MILLER

customer_reviews.title: The Volleyball sucks
customer_reviews.text: The rackets are holding up so far. The shuttlecock is not very good but will definitely do for now. The net is easy to setup and very portable. I can't say the same for the volleyball, it popped after a session of playing. Not really worth the hassle of returning and asking for a replacement. If you're looking for something to take to the park or beach, this is for you. Just make sure you buy a different ball.
customer_reviews.author: Vince G.

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: Best set ever! Perfect for volleyball and badminton (good net hole sizing). Very sturdy and easy set up (my kids put it together). I am so glad I bought the used set which was in perfect condition! The new set was backordered. We have had other badminton and volleyball sets that sagged and fell apart. This one will last!!!! Everything is quality made. I love that the main poles rest on the ground and it is still strong. No more digging holes.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta French

customer_reviews.title: Real Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This set was worth the money. The rackets have decent strings that are tight enough to control the birdie. Have not used the volleyball yet but it looks like decent quality. The net is outstanding and the ropes, spikes and borders are great also. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Stride

customer_reviews.title: Could be 5 star with better design
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give 5 star but due to some bad design, I rated it as 4. Starting with net, the rope inside the net played a vital role when tied to poles. But there is no tag/stopper on both end so if one pull it harder from one end you are in deep trouble as you have to spend hour or two to bring it back on both end. Also the air pump broken in first use.
customer_reviews.author: Adeel A.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new not used.
customer_reviews.text: Technically I bought this used so I expected so wear & tear but didn't anticipate the sand that came out of the bag & all over my floor when I opened it. A few things were bent which was disappointing but it worked for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dibskies!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome badminton and volleyball set!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and the best set ever bought!! High quality as well!!! My family and I had fun!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nate/Diana

customer_reviews.title: ALL and all seems to be a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Drill holes in the bottom of the steel posts. If the sprinkler is on and or it rains the posts can fill up with water and cause them to rust out. ALL and all seems to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy professional set- will last for years
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy durable set. I did not want a flimsy thing that will only last one season and end up in the landfill. This met the bill. I am sure we will have this for many many years. The rackets were also nice for us as beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Pole quality poor
customer_reviews.text: The net is great quality as is the rope. The problem is the bottom piece of the poles. It isn’t a tight fit and caves in when the net is tight. They are really loose in that piece. For the price I would think they wouldn’t be caving in.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, detailed instructions, Great quality
customer_reviews.text: very easy to assemble, wanted set that is sturdy, movable, and durable. This is that set. Love the packaging, the, container bag and detailed instructions. This is a good quality set.
customer_reviews.author: SUE WEBB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. It is well designed to be easy to setup and use. The boundry line is awesome and has grommets in it pre measured for badminton and volleyball. The piles are big and sturdy. They are also able to be setup for either badminton or volleyball. The only negative is that the volleyball included is low quality. This set was definitely worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Order a couple weeks in advance or don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a pretty quality piece...other than the racquets. Ordered it just in time for a graduation party. Nope...one racquet is bent and the rim is cracked all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Baden...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed because all of the ropes are fraying after ONE use! I expected more from Baden. Unfortunately not. Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: This set was awesome. I took 300 6th graders to the park ...
customer_reviews.text: Holy guacamole! This set was awesome. I took 300 6th graders to the park for a picnic and at least half of them abused the net at some point. It took a real beating and survived. We did not use the badminton gear, but the net and poles were impressive.
customer_reviews.author: NorthwestMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Net long set up
customer_reviews.text: Great quality net and poles; difficult to set up however 2-4 person job. In order to get the net tight you will need to tie some very good knots on the draw strings prior to increasing the tension.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Set up is great-ball sucks
customer_reviews.text: We set it up and it works really well! The volleyball is really hard though so we're using a different one. I haven't tried out the perimeter line yet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Measure measure measure
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly well made but be sure you want Olympic quality. This is not for easy assemble play in the yard. This takes serious work to put up and take down. MAKE SURE YOU MEASURE- takes up “Olympic size” space- ie- you need huge space.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with this set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!!! It is so worth it! It is so durable and also so easy to set up, take down and store. This is the second set we bought. Our first set someone borrowed and it got lost. We can’t live with out it. We use it all the time in the summer so we had to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: This was pretty easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to setup, but it would have been nice if it came with clamps or something to help you adjust the net to the width of the court you want.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vincent Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The net is decent an all but the poles amd braces can't sustain the weight and net sags badly after a short amount of time. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set for the price and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my kids while we are stuck at home during the pandemic. They love it. It's really easy to set up and it's nice to have the court outline and big net. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Longsdorf

customer_reviews.title: TRICKY TO SET UP AND NOT DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Why all the stars for this product?! Tricky to set up and the badminton rackets broke on first use, which is dangerous for the children we wanted to use the product. I will have to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Saga

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. A great kit that will last a long time. Very durable, well packaged. I’m glad I didn’t go for a cheaper set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandkids love to play!!! This is a high quality set with everything you need to play volleyball and badminton. Easy to set up and take down and put away in the zippered bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality set, especially for the amount of money spent. Extremely easy to set up. Sturdy and roomy storage/travel case. We travelled with it to a family reunion and it was a big hit with the adults as well as the children. Used both the volleyball and the badminton components. Look for the needle to inflate volleyball clipped inside the air pump handle. Efficient!
customer_reviews.author: sabrina ann bowling

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard fun.
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time. Sturdy and easy set up at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieM

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor family time
customer_reviews.text: A savior during lockdown. Easy to set up, a complete set. We tend to play badminton more because we are able to volley more. It is now a new family favorite! Badminton - who knew
customer_reviews.author: Marix

customer_reviews.title: Its not worth the money the birdies fly apart
customer_reviews.text: This set is poorly made! I know it’s an affordable set but for the birdies to separate on the first hits! They literally fell apart!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Allen

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son and his family. They absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: but it was relatively easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this set once so far, for a party, but it was relatively easy to set up and take down, and the kids got so much use out of it at that one party that it was already worth the money. I expect it will last for a long time as long as you don't leave it set up between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Debi R

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The only disadvantage is the net is soooo long it's hard to set up in the backyard. Otherwise, awesome set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy material
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made not cheap at all. With standsteenagers and kids. We were very satisfied with this purchase. I especially like the ribbon the borders the entire court.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: We used this l summer. Easy to move when mowing and easy set up in general. Sturdy also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: this is NOT a cheap set. Its easy to set up. Sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: The net and ropes are made out of sturdy material and the poles are metal
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than other sets, but the quality is night and day. The net and ropes are made out of sturdy material and the poles are metal. I wasn't entirely prepared for how large this set is so you'll want to make sure you have plenty of room to set this thing up. If you do, you'll probably love it if nothing else than for how well made the net is.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set ,make sure you have enough room in your yard to set it up because it is very large .
customer_reviews.author: Munster

customer_reviews.title: Ball will not stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: The set is pretty great, easy to set up and looks nice but our volley ball will not stay inflated long enough to finish out a game. It's really annoying to have to keep inflating in the middle of games. Does anyone know if they will send out a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Nichole G.

customer_reviews.title: We’re thinking about having a badminton tournament!
customer_reviews.text: First had an issue about shipping...faulty box. Baden made it right! This set is very impressive for the money!!!! The rackets are very good quality and the volleyball is great! Very happy! Even has lines for the court!
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: great value, works great, easy to install, value is there for sure.
customer_reviews.text: great value, works great, easy to install, value is there for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Net lasted court lines... not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The net was easy to set up. After a couple ofmonths of use the poles have oxidized. The court straps held up much less... they faded with in first week and after a month they have shredded.
customer_reviews.author: GMA

customer_reviews.title: Backyard fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love this purchase! The net is really easy to put up and take down. So convenient for our back door parties. The net is official size too! The quality exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jennelle

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was good quality. It was just too big for our needs. It looks like regulation size.
customer_reviews.author: CamalaBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice sturdy metal poles. Not flimsy plastic ones. The net is quite long so you will need a pretty wide area. Easy to assemble. My teenagers did everything from assembling and putting up the net.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Can I give it more than 5 stars??
customer_reviews.text: I got it for $90 which I think was a steal. Would have happily paid $199 for it. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: SUDEEP

customer_reviews.title: This set is easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: This set is easy to set up and take down. The net stays tight, and it is simple to switch the volleyball to badminton boundary markers. The quality of the ball, and rackets is better than what I have seen at other stores. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jfmuta

customer_reviews.title: Made To Last!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! The poles are not thin like the cheap versions found at most retail stores and the net is also heavy duty. The Volleyball is top notch along with the Badminton rackets. Comes with a very nice carrying bag! Glad I spent the extra get this set that will last me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Curry

customer_reviews.title: Rackets fell apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: Good: The case and boarder are good/quality. Bad: As you can see from the photo the rackets fell apart and this was taken 1 hour after we started playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: I think it is better to go to the sports store for this need.
customer_reviews.text: This product is to big for the normal yard. The rackets and birdies are of low quality.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing rackets and birdies don’t want to rerun whole thing. Don’t know how to get in touch with seller to tell then
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product with good quality assembly. Very fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana

customer_reviews.title: Definite winner.
customer_reviews.text: We finally had nice weather and put the net up in anticipation of a fourth of July family reunion. This is a substantial net and pole with strong support lines. The carrying case is very nice and the set included a hand pump with needle for the volleyball. Real feather shuttlecocks too!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy volleyball net, easy to put up, and also easy to change the boundaries to create a smaller court. The ball is great too! Nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Tons on fun
customer_reviews.text: So fun and versatile. Great for an active family or gathering. Pretty easy to put up & take down. Love this set
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Clampitt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This net does NOT have stability. The stakes doesn't hold the poles properly to the ground. Just returned!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly. We loved using it. Bigger than we thought it would be but definitely worth the money. Don’t forget your hammer when putting this together. We learned the hard way and had to use a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Nice set and has everything for a complete setup. Family enjoyed at the last get together and was a product with adults and kids alike. Pay a little more for this product than the cheap ones, lasts longer, durable and more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Anish Soman

customer_reviews.title: ... read were right and I don't know what the bad reviews were seeing
customer_reviews.text: The goods reviews I read were right and I don't know what the bad reviews were seeing. I found the product perfect for a very rousing game of Volleyball and Badminton. We had a family event of about 50 people and it held up well. The setup was simple and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: JohnPBass

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to set up and play. My only recommendation is to add markers for the badminton court into the boarder like the half court marker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great as Advertise.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on time, no complain, all same as advertise. Good PRoduct, i dont have any complain until now.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor company fun
customer_reviews.text: This was purchase for a company outing. The assembly was quite easy with simple to follow instructions. Our employees had a blast playing volleyball. I think this was a good purchase, because we plan to do this outing every year as a team building exercise.
customer_reviews.author: PCBO

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup with 2 people. HUGE length. Might even be regulation. Family Fun in 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Real Deal

customer_reviews.title: Nice little kit
customer_reviews.text: Had a yard full of folks and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A Miner

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good, just not air valve needle supplied to inflate the vollyball
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Very well made...n
customer_reviews.text: We had it up in minutes. It'll last a long time. Price is right. It lets you mark off the court with great cord marker. Loved it.....n
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent volley/batmitten set
customer_reviews.text: Wow excellent quality! I'm very impressed with everything that came with this set! Well worth the money. Only 1 thing though, the line posts for the ground don't hold the net up that well. If they were twice as long it would've helped. Still 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid sturdy kit with a high quality net and metal poles
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid sturdy kit with a high quality net and metal poles. It lasted all summer and it's going up again. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Bowland

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality set. Easy setup and the ropes that hold the poles up with stakes in the ground have nice tension adjusters to tighten up the slack whenever needed. Get the LED birdies for some fun night time play at parties. Also a small table to place drinks on because it's hard to play without spilling your beer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up! Pretty sturdy too, except when you have a puppy that runs straight into the lines and knocks it down............
customer_reviews.author: Ali B.

customer_reviews.title: Great set up net was just too big for the yard!
customer_reviews.text: The item was returned due to the large net specs for the volleyball size, otherwise, it was a great package.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Nice Storage bag. Fun for summer! Easy set up
customer_reviews.author: DanaGo

customer_reviews.title: Fam Fun Enabler
customer_reviews.text: Although not put up just yet, the quality of the materials and items look and feel great. We look forward to getting it up in the yard and using this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great badminton set - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great badminton set! Net stays up very well and seems like it will be very durable. The inclusion of a boundary line is helpful. Badminton rackets are of good quality. Very easy to put together as well. Seems to be a hit in this neighborhood!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: I would give nore stars if this is resolved because everything else looks great. I will update if i can get the ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we didn't receive all of the poles. We got the bottom and top but not the center poles. So we can't raise it to play volleyball. I would give nore stars if this is resolved because everything else looks great. I will update if i can get the other poles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Baden Champions Volleyball Badminton Combo Set
product_meta.description:
This 2-in-1 Baden Champions Volleyball & Badminton Combo Set provides the ultimate versatility in backyard game play. This quick and easy to assemble yard game set comes with all the equipment needed to play both badminton and volleyball. So, grab your friends and family today and stake out your own piece of the park with this sets highly visible red and black regulation size volleyball net and boundary lines. This set won’t only secure your own piece of the park, but you’ll be the envy of it after your group sets up this beautiful regulation size combo net system. Just imagine, one moment everyone is watching and cheering you on in an exhilarating game of volleyball, then minutes later you’re smashing the shuttlecock on the competition in the fast-paced game of badminton. This set is perfect for introducing novice players and younger children to both games of volleyball and badminton. With the adjustable net we have found that the younger ages are able to play and get the volleyball over the badminton height setting. Grabs your set today and enjoy hours of backyard gaming fun with friends and family. This set is truly made with every backyard champion in mind.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Baden’s driving mission is PASSION FOR A BETTER GAME. This passion drives every decision and aspect of Baden's business. We are a leader in innovation, creativity and quality, with a 35 year history of introducing major advancements in product design and engineering for a variety of sports. Our quality assurance team directs the manufacturing process on site to ensure that all products meet Baden's stringent standards.
feature_bullets: Quick & easy setup - adjustable steel poles allow easy set-up and seamless transition between game types

Built tough - this high-quality, long-lasting set will endure the elements. And its heavy duty powder coated steel poles, waterproof edges, and durable nylon rope are strong enough to withstand any level of competition
Grab & Go - this 2-in-1 game set fits perfectly into its durable weather-resistant carry bag for easy storage and transportation
Set includes - regulation size nylon volleyball and badminton net, poles, stakes, 1 high-quality Baden volleyball, 4 badminton racquets, 3 shuttlecocks, boundary lines, and carrying case
Heavy duty steel poles and 3’ x 32’ Tournament quality nylon net put this set above the rest. 1. 25 inch wide webbing boundary
GREAT FOR – 2+ people, yard games, family cookouts, summer camps, and social events
